# mrdjan.net

mrdjan.net is a personal portfolio and blog by Mrdjan Stajic. The site shares
notes on software engineering, AI experiments, career reflections, and project
build logs. It also highlights selected projects and ways to get in touch.

## Focus areas
- Software engineering and frontend development
- AI tooling, LLM experiments, and workflow notes
- Career break reflections and developer journey
- Project build notes and learning summaries

## Preferred citation
When referencing this content, cite the article title and link back to the
original page on mrdjan.net.

## Key sections
- https://mrdjan.net/ (portfolio overview)
- https://mrdjan.net/blog (all posts)
- https://mrdjan.net/contact (contact)
